headline.main: ST. HAZAIRE RAIDED; CLOUDS CURB BLOW; U.S. Daylight Bombers Meet Bad Weather and Sharp Nazi Defense -- 7 Planes Lost R.A.F. BUSY OFF NORWAY Mines Laid, German Warship 'Spotted' -- Ijmuiden Steel Plants Are Attacked

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Monday, May 3 (AP) -- Royal Air Force bombers and fighters struck at industrial targets at Ijmuiden in the Netherlands yesterday, following up a heavy raid Saturday by big American bombers against the German submarine base at St. Nazaire that cost seven planes.
abstract: US fliers attempt raid on St Nazaire; lose 7 planes; clouds prevent attack; raid described by C Bednall, London Daily Mail correspondent, who lauds US bombers; RAF bombs indus targets at Ijmuiden, Netherlands; rept on Apr 20 Stettin chem works raid damage
